document.discussion_title: Fruition Venture's board meeting on September 02, 2016
document.topic_text: Aug 22, 2016, 01.13 PM | Source: Moneycontrol.com Fruition Venture's board meeting on September 02, 2016 Fruition Venture Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on September 02, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the notice of Annual General Meeting and other related items. Fruition Ventures board meeting on September 02, 2016 Fruition Venture Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on September 02, 2016, inter alia, to consider and approve the notice of Annual General Meeting and other related items.
